author: dfinke
body:
The command "(cd tools && ./download.sh)" failed and exited with 127 during 

Is there a write up on how to wire travis-ci to a fork? 

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/67258/18147059/04e918a6-6fa1-11e6-833d-8122f90c61fa.png)

comments.author: vors
comments.body: Looks like it failed to download the .deb package. Could be for various reasons (i.e. non-authenticated calls to github API is limited). Can you re-trigger the build and see does it happen consistently or not?

title: travis-ci on a fork fails
